content: i love the pineapple stitch if you do too try this pattern it takes a while until the pineapples appear but they will eventually i promise i used sport yarn for this project but any heavier yarn should work well too especially if you d like your shawl to get bigger just remember to grab the bigger hook if you have any questions about the pattern feel free to visit my group 2 and ask 1 http //www ravelry com/discuss/amigurumi-and-more-by-just-in/topics/2352978 2 http //www ravelry com/groups/amigurumi-and-more-by-just-in
